title: SOLOTECH

slug: solotech
categories: []

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with SOLOTECH. The average
  contract duration was 0.43 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $161.1K.
  The longest contract was 5.01 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $11.3M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '219'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '22'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '10%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '49%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.73'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '7.4M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.43'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '161.1K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '5.01'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '11.3M'
